required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Hula, a Physical Activity Intervention for Female-Cancer Survivors
clinical_study.official_title: Hula, a Physical Activity Intervention for Female-Cancer Survivors

brief_summary.textblock: A six-month interventional program to determine the biological and psychosocial effects of hula as a form of physical activity for female breast, cervical, endometrial or ovarian cancer survivors living on Oahu.

primary_outcome.measure: Hula Program Feasibility (Compliance as measured by the proportion of total sessions attended and a questionnaire regarding satisfaction with the program at the end of the intervention)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months after the start of the intervention program
primary_outcome.description: Compliance as measured by the proportion of total sessions attended and a questionnaire regarding satisfaction with the program at the end of the intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Biomarkers - Sex Hormones (Circulating levels of sex hormones measured in serum samples)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: Circulating levels of sex hormones measured in serum samples.

secondary_outcome.measure: Biomarkers - Cytokines (Circulating levels of cytokines measured in serum samples.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: Circulating levels of cytokines measured in serum samples.

secondary_outcome.measure: Biomarkers - Inflammatory Markers (Circulating levels of leptin, CRP, IGF-1, and IGFBP3 measured in serum samples collectively.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: Circulating levels of leptin, CRP, IGF-1, and IGFBP3 measured in serum samples collectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: DNA Methylation Patterns (DNA methylation patterns as detected with the Illumina Assay containing methylation sites in RefSeq genes and CpG islands collectively.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: DNA methylation patterns as detected with the Illumina Assay containing methylation sites in RefSeq genes and CpG islands collectively.

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Demographics (Collectively looking at demographic items as measured on the baseline questionnaire, including ethnicity, education, family, history of cancer, stage of cancer, treatment type, and comorbidities.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: Collectively looking at demographic items as measured on the baseline questionnaire, including ethnicity, education, family, history of cancer, stage of cancer, treatment type, and comorbidities.

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Physical Activity (Minutes per week of exercise assessed using The Women's Health Initiative Physical Activity Questionnaire)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: Minutes per week of exercise assessed using The Women's Health Initiative Physical Activity Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Health-Related Quality of Life (Quality of life of participants assessed using The European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer QLQ-C30.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Fatigue (assessed using The Brief Fatigue Inventory (BFI)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: The severity and impact of fatigue on daily functioning assessed using The Brief Fatigue Inventory (BFI).

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Depression (indicated using The Centers for Epidemiological Studies Depression Scale (CES-ED)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: The presence of depression as indicated using The Centers for Epidemiological Studies Depression Scale (CES-ED).

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Affective States (assessed using The Profile of Mood States short form (POMS-SF) questionnaire.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: Affect of participants assessed using The Profile of Mood States short form (POMS-SF) questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Social Constraints (assessed using The 10-item Social Constraints Scale.)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: How people adjust and cope with a cancer diagnosis assessed using The 10-item Social Constraints Scale.

secondary_outcome.measure: Self-Report Outcomes - Cognitive Functioning (assessed using the 42-item FACTcog
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 months and 12 months after the start of the intervention program
secondary_outcome.description: 2 subscales assess cognitive deficiency and cognitive capability

arm_group.description: Hula is an ancient, Native Hawaiian dance form of cultural expression and physical activity. Participants will attend one-hour hula classes twice a week for six months.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Lives on Oahu
- Diagnosed with primary breast,cervical, endometrial or ovarian cancer (stage I-III)
- Completed initial regional and systemic treatment for breast cancer 2 months ago
- Physically capable of doing the hula-based physical activity
- Receives approval by attending physician to participate in trial
Exclusion Criteria:
- Currently undergoing chemotherapy or radiation therapy

overall_official.affiliation: University of Hawaii Cancer Research Center
